entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
